attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
VW caddy facelift model. vechile presents very neat both externally and on interior cab seats. vechile has low mileage for the year and a full service history as well as spare keys. recently just had a full service plus plus new tyres all round. has the added bonus of a steel roof rail carrier for carrying extra loads externally. Extended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.
We can arrange vehicle finance and assist with trade ins.   
Terms and Conditions apply.
Please call Paul on 0829527479  to view by appointment only.

PLEASE NOTE....All our vehicles are priced to sell and exclude on the road fees.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.

We offer value added products / Service and Warranty / Plan extensions. We deliver Nationwide. PDC front and Rear
